description: The DND is seeking suppliers with expertise in the streams and categories listed previously to fulfill this RFP.
full_summary:
===============

### Tender Notice

#### National Capital Region Tender Announcement

* **Reference Number:** CB-680-77379909
* **Publication Date:** December 20, 2023
* **Closing Date:** January 3, 2024

#### Tender Description

The Department of National Defense (DND) is seeking to engage a supplier under the Temporary Help Services (THS) Supply Arrangement (SA) for the National Capital Region (NCR). 

The requirement is for temporary personnel services and is open only to supply arrangement holders under EN578-172870 who qualified under the following stream and category: 10.1 Communications. 

A notice of solicitation and procurement details can be accessed through the Canadabuys platform here: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28046/s4762134---method-2---rfp-%282_0.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28046/s4762134---method-2---rfp-%282_0.pdf)

#### Supply Arrangement Holders Invited

The following SA Holders have been invited to submit a proposal for the above-noted requirement:

* Aaron Aubin Consulting Inc.
* Adecco Employment Services Limited
* ARTEMP PERSONNEL SERVICES INC
* Cache Computer Consulting Corp.
* CLOSEREACH LTD.
* Contract Community Inc.
* Groupe Intersol Group Ltee.
* Maverin Inc.
* Newfound Recruiting Corporation
* OLAV CONSULTING CORP.
* Quarry Consulting Inc.
* SoftSim Technologies Inc.
* Solutions LDC Inc.
* Thinkpoint Inc.
* Valcom Consulting group Inc.

#### Contact Information

Queries regarding the tender notice should be directed to:

* CFSG (O-G) Temp Help
* Email: [CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca](mailto:CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca)
* Phone: (613) 971-7955

Please note that the tender closing date is January 3, 2024, at 12:00 PM.  Services required under this contract are temporary personnel services. 

### Procurement Information

* **Procurement Category:** SRV
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Selection Criteria
